TopicTitle: Where can I find the download?

Articles.Content:
So, I purchased KSP a few years ago. Because my CPU hates me, my KSP file got corrupted once I tried to update.

I tried to re-download it, but now I can't find it anywhere. Please help.

Edited October 22, 2016 by Laurendahl

Hi.

If you bought the game on the KSP store, it should still be available via https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/ - or will be when the office wakes up on Monday and fixes the current problem. If you can't find the email and password you signed up with, you need to contact [email protected] and they'll attempt to validate your account by other means.

If you bought via Steam, you should still have the game in your library, and you can log in, download and play it as usual. The same applies through GOG via their website or Galaxy client.

Also it's not against the rules to keep the store package you download as a backup in case your CPU borks on you again.

HTH

Edited October 22, 2016 by technicalfool
Added link
